text: William Fawcett (1894â€“1974) was an American character actor in movies from 1946 through the 1960s. He also played on television. He starred in the television series, Fury from 1955 through 1960. Summers, Neil and Crowley, Roger M., TV Western Round-Up Book, The Old West Shop Publishing, 2002 He taught English and literature at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln and became a professor of theatre arts at Michigan State University. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1894 births Category:1974 deaths Category:American Methodists Category:Academics from Michigan Category:American military personnel of World War I Category:Recipients of the Order of the Legion of Honour Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:Educators from Minnesota Category:Military people from Minnesota
title: William Fawcett
